Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Incorrect XML documentation comment for 'OpenXmlBasePart.OpenXmlPackage'" (#511) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
The following source code XML comment (which likely propagates to the developer documentation, though I didn't verify that) is incorrect (and somewhat illogical):

https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/blob/601492385e0130f63b39ac1735d58d3a394e3a69/src/DocumentFormat.OpenXml/Packaging/OpenXmlBasePart.cs#L265-L268

This should instead read: **"Gets the OpenXmlPackage which contains the current part."**

The suggested text is taken from the (correct) XML documentation for the `OpenXmlPackage` property in the `OpenXml.Packaging.DataPart` class:

https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/blob/601492385e0130f63b39ac1735d58d3a394e3a69/src/DocumentFormat.OpenXml/Packaging/DataPart.cs#L42

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Edit OpenXmlBasePart property comment (fixes #511)" (#528) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This implements the change suggested [here](https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/issues/511#issue-336838389). The issue looked dormant and easy to fix.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Edit OpenXmlBasePart property comment (fixes #511)" (#528) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This implements the change suggested [here](https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/issues/511#issue-336838389). The issue looked dormant and easy to fix.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "add missing namespace in debug-build" (#266) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Opened issue "ChartUpdater does not work with Waterfall Charts." (#265) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody: I am trying to update data in waterfall chart in word but chartupdater is unable to do this. ChartUpdater does not exist as ChartPart on the MainDocumentPart of word document but it exists as an ExtendedPart. Have you any ideas how to make this work in chart updater?

Events.RelatedBody:
dotnet build OpenXmlPowerTools.sln

apparently notepad isn't the way to edit this file as it shows everythign changed but I just added 

using System.Diagnostics;

as line 3 or it wouldn't compile for me.

Events.RelatedBody:
Helo,

But the images are didn't convert.
How can i embedded the image as encoding base 64?
